sections.title: Current Direction
body: - Stabilise codec3 decoding so colour plates and zbuffers render correctly in tooling and automated dumps.
- Keep the viewer focused on Manny's office assets while exposing depth metadata for regression tracking.

sections.title: Active Threads
body: - Model how `.zbm` depth ranges map to engine clip space and decide how normalisation should behave across scenes.
- Audit other bitmap format codes to see which additional render paths the viewer must support.

sections.title: Next Steps
body: 1. Lock in regression coverage for seeded codec3 paths (colour + depth) so Manny's office stays stable.
2. Extend the viewer CLI to export paired colour/depth dumps for easier comparisons.

workstreams.prompt: Objective: keep Manny's office rendering faithful by matching codec3 behaviour between colour `.bm` plates and `.zbm` depth maps. Ensure seeded windows mirror the original engine, expose depth ranges for validation, and land regression tests or tooling that prevent the half-black regression from returning.
